rows.label: qev030602_MSG0001
rows.name:
Damn. My legs are numb. I wanted to hunt feast of
imp lophid meat for Nemard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0002
rows.name: Heh. Now they feast on me instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Hmm? Earth alien here? This place is home to imp
lophids. Leave before you are found, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev03060201_JNK0010
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: qev03060201_SEL0011
rows.name: Assist Heptana.

rows.label: qev03060201_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev03060201_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Heptana that Nemard wishes to marry her.

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thank you, Earth alien. My man needs support.
I must return to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0005
rows.name: He lacks your bravery. He will be lost without me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0006
rows.name: ...What? Nemard sent you here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0007
rows.name: He wishes me to be his mate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ha! All more reason I cannot end day as food for
imp lophids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0009
rows.name:
What? Me? Ha! Nemard is hopeless.
I knew he would be lost without me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0010
rows.name:
All more reason I cannot end day as food for
imp lophids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am ashamed to ask, but...
Can you please help me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0012
rows.name:
One of them has returned. You must defeat it.
I must live to see Nemard's face again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thank you. Had you not come, I would have been
meal for imp lophids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0014
rows.name: My legs are fine now. I can walk home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0015
rows.name:
But marriage? Hmm.
What do you think of Nemard, Earth alien?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_JNK0030
rows.name: Be Positive

rows.label: qev030602_SEL0031
rows.name: Give Heptana a good impression of Nemard.

rows.label: qev030602_JNK0040
rows.name: Be Negative

rows.label: qev030602_SEL0041
rows.name: Give Heptana a critical impression of Nemard.

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0016
rows.name:
You have keen eye for men. Nemard is unreliable in
everyday life. But he faces challenge in time of crisis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0017
rows.name:
He is firmly under thumb of little sister, Liana.
Also terrible hunter. He is weak. Hopeless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0018
rows.name:
But he also risked his life to keep me safe.
He is man who does what must be done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0019
rows.name: When Ganglion captured us, they almost...hurt me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0020
rows.name:
But Nemard charged them. They were armed.
He was not. He did not hesitate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0021
rows.name:
They beat him badly. I was sure he would die.
But he smiled. Said his injuries were nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0022
rows.name: I must be at his side. I must keep him out of trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0023
rows.name:
I will be his mate. Rite of marriage will happen
when I return. You must attend as my guest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0024
rows.name:
Nemard made me horn-ring of betrothal. It was
crafted from horn of great beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0025
rows.name:
He is useless at hunting. It must have been long fight.
Painful fight. All for me? He is kind fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0026
rows.name: I am marrying Nemard... It seems unreal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0027
rows.name: Maybe it will seem more real when I put on ring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0028
rows.name: Ah! You are back at last![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0029
rows.name: We have request of you. Please speak with Nemard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0030
rows.name: I see Nemard likes his women tame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0031
rows.name: Hmph. I hope they are happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030602_MSG0032
rows.name: This is no time for talk! Hurry up! Fight![ST:wait ]
